title: Setting Up Your Ekobol Profile
author: Ekobol Support Team
image_caption: Set up your profile with enterprise-grade security and customization.
p1: Your Ekobol profile is the foundation of your e-commerce command center. Proper configuration ensures personalized insights, secure access, and optimized workflows. This comprehensive guide covers everything from basic setup to advanced security features.
li1_text: Log in to your Ekobol control panel using your credentials.
li2_text: Click on your profile avatar or username in the top-right corner of the navigation bar.
li3_text: Select 'Profile Settings' or 'My Account' from the dropdown menu.
li4_text: Alternatively, use keyboard shortcut: Ctrl+P (Windows) or Cmd+P (Mac).
p2: Keep your account information current for accurate notifications and business insights.
li5_text: Enter your complete first and last name. This appears on invoices and official documents.
li6_text: Primary email for account notifications, password resets, and security alerts. Verify email after changing.
li7_text: Required for SMS alerts and two-factor authentication. International format recommended (+90...).
li8_text: Upload a professional photo (JPG/PNG, max 2MB). Appears in team collaborations and support tickets.
li9_text: Click 'Save Changes' to apply updates. You'll receive confirmation via email.
p3: Strong password hygiene is critical for account security. Follow enterprise-grade standards.
li11_text: Mix of uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and symbols (!@#$%^&*)
li12_text: Avoid common words, dictionary terms, or personal information
li13_text: Never reuse passwords across different services
li14_text: Use a password manager (1Password, LastPass, Bitwarden)
li16_text: Enter your current password for verification
li17_text: Enter new password (must meet complexity requirements)
li19_text: Click 'Update Password' - you'll be logged out and must sign in again
p4: Password change triggers email notification to all associated addresses for security.
p5: Add an extra layer of security by requiring a second verification method when signing in.
li20_text: Prevents unauthorized access even if password is compromised
li21_text: Required for handling sensitive financial data
li22_text: Industry best practice for e-commerce platforms
li23_text: Insurance against phishing and credential stuffing attacks
li24_text: Go to Settings → Security → Two-Factor Authentication
li26_text: Choose method: Authenticator App (Google Authenticator, Authy) or SMS
li27_text: Authenticator App is recommended for better security
li28_text: Scan QR code with your authenticator app
li29_text: Enter the 6-digit code from app to verify
li30_text: Save backup codes in secure location (password manager or encrypted file)
li31_text: 2FA is now active - required on every login from new devices
p6: If you lose access to your 2FA device:
li32_text: Use one of your 10 backup codes (each code works once)
li33_text: Contact support with account verification (government ID + business documents)
li34_text: Recovery process takes 24-48 hours for security verification
li35_text: Once recovered, immediately set up new 2FA method
p7: Ekobol tailors experiences based on your business profile and marketplace activity.
li36_text: Legal business name as registered. Appears on invoices and official communications.
li37_text: Select: Individual Seller, Small Business, Medium Enterprise, Large Corporation.
li38_text: Required for tax reporting and marketplace compliance.
li39_text: Physical location for legal correspondence and return shipments.
li40_text: Select platforms where you sell: Trendyol, Amazon, Etsy, Hepsiburada, N11, etc.
li41_text: Primary currency for financial reporting (TRY, USD, EUR, GBP).
li43_text: Ensure accurate order timestamps and scheduled tasks.
p8: Accurate business info enables better AI recommendations and marketplace-specific optimizations.
p9: Control alert frequency and notification channels to avoid overwhelm.
li44_text: New Orders: Instant alert when order is placed
li45_text: Low Stock Warnings: Daily digest when inventory drops below threshold
li46_text: Customer Messages: Real-time alert for new inquiries
li47_text: Payment Received: Confirmation when funds clear
li48_text: AI Recommendations: Weekly summary of optimization suggestions
li50_text: Urgent Orders: High-value or priority shipments
li51_text: Marketplace Issues: API disconnections or sync failures
li53_text: Critical Security: Login from new device, password changes
li54_text: Payment Failures: Subscription or transaction issues
p10: Customize notification frequency: Instant, Hourly Digest, Daily Summary, or Off.
p11: If you have team members, assign appropriate permission levels.
role_admin_access: All except billing and team deletion
li55_text: Go to Settings → Team → Invite Member
li58_text: Click 'Send Invitation' - they receive signup link via email
p12: Control what information is visible to marketplaces and third parties.
li60_text: Marketing Opt-In: Receive promotional emails from Ekobol
li61_text: Data Sharing: Allow anonymous usage analytics for platform improvement
li62_text: Marketplace Visibility: Share performance data with connected platforms
li63_text: Third-Party Integrations: Allow access to authorized apps (Shopify, WooCommerce)
p13: Review privacy settings quarterly to ensure compliance with your preferences.
li64_text: Generate API keys for custom integrations
li65_text: Set key expiration dates for security
li66_text: Monitor API usage and rate limits
li67_text: View active sessions across all devices
li69_text: Set auto-logout timeout (15 min, 1 hour, 8 hours, disabled)
p14: To permanently delete your account and all data:
li70_text: Navigate to Settings → Account → Danger Zone
li73_text: All data erased except legal/tax records (retained 7 years)
li75_text: ✅ Use strong, unique password with password manager
li76_text: ✅ Keep email and phone number current
li78_text: ✅ Complete business information for tax compliance
li79_text: ✅ Configure notification preferences to avoid alert fatigue
li81_text: ✅ Check active sessions monthly for unauthorized access
p15: A properly configured profile is the foundation of secure, efficient e-commerce operations. Taking time to set up these features now saves hours of troubleshooting later.
help_text: Questions about profile security or team management? Our support team is here 24/7.
